The Immersion Projector simulates real sensory input, letting you step into the story and experience the adventure alongside the main character. It's going to be an unforgettable experience.

Just a heads-up: the Golden Age films available today haven't been fully restored. Years of being lost caused some data to corrupt, and the plots are a bit jumbled. We're still working to separate the original content from the damage time has left behind.
During playback, the device helps viewers fill in the gaps and reconstruct the storyline. That's what makes early access to these films possible.
That also means the adventure you experience inside the film may not exactly match the original story.
If you're set on seeing the original version, we can adjust the settings. With Lucia's computing power, we can fix the corrupted data in real time during playback.
But the process is tedious and breaks the story's flow. It really hurts the immersion. I wouldn't recommend it.
